com.wikitude.common.plugins

Class Plugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wikitude.common.plugins.Plugin

  • public abstract class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plugin(java.lang.String identifier)
      Constructor, pass a unique identifier for each of your plugins.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void cameraFrameAvailable(Frame cameraFrame)
      Will be called every time the Wikitude Enigine receives a new camera frame from the platform camera.
      protected void destroy()
      Will be called when the Wikitude Engine shuts down.
      protected void endRender()
      Will be called right after any Wikitude SDK internal rendering is done.
      java.lang.String getIdentifier()
      Returns the identifier of this particular plugin.
      protected void initialize()
      Will be called once after your Plugin was successfully added to the Wikitude Engine.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Return the enabled state of this particular plugin.
      protected void pause()
      Will be called every time the Wikitude Engine pauses.
      protected void resume(long pausedTime)
      Will be called when the Wikitude Engine starts for the first time and after every pause.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Set's this plugin enabled or not.
      protected void startRender()
      Will be called before any Wikitude SDK internal rendering is done.
      abstract void update(RecognizedTarget[] recognizedTargets)
      Will be called after every image recognition cycle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plugin

        public Plugin(java.lang.String identifier)
        Constructor, pass a unique identifier for each of your plugins.
        Parameters:
        identifier -

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Will be called once after your Plugin was successfully added to the Wikitude Engine. Initialize your plugin here.

      • pause

        protected void pause()
        Will be called every time the Wikitude Engine pauses.

      • resume

        protected void resume(long pausedTime)
        Will be called when the Wikitude Engine starts for the first time and after every pause.
        Parameters:
        pausedTime - the duration of the pause in milliseconds

      • destroy

        protected void destroy()
        Will be called when the Wikitude Engine shuts down.

      • startRender

        protected void startRender()
        Will be called before any Wikitude SDK internal rendering is done. Therefore any drawn objects are behind any Wikitude SDK object.

      • endRender

        protected void endRender()
        Will be called right after any Wikitude SDK internal rendering is done. Therefore any drawn objects are in front of any Wikitude SDK object.

      • cameraFrameAvailable

        public abstract void cameraFrameAvailable(Frame cameraFrame)
        Will be called every time the Wikitude Enigine receives a new camera frame from the platform camera.
        Parameters:
        cameraFrame - frame wrapper object which contains the frame data and some metadata about the frame

      • update

        public abstract void update(RecognizedTarget[] recognizedTargets)
        Will be called after every image recognition cycle.
        Parameters:
        recognizedTargets - list of recognized targets or null if no target was recognized

      • getIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier of this particular plugin.
        Returns:
        Identifier

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Return the enabled state of this particular plugin.
        Returns:
        Enabled state

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set's this plugin enabled or not. A enabled plugin receives cameraFrameAvailable, update, startRender and endRender calls.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true or false
